@a_merrydew @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe So I‚Äôm confused today because the outside of the house is absolutely there with a vengeance but I couldn‚Äôt smell it inside. I have the sore throat and bad chest but assumed that was from the last 2 days. Now wondering am I becoming desensitised to it?! @StinkStopthe
RT @corthorne: Now the River Pinn appears to be showing signs of pollution. Is there no end to the blight this monstrous project is visitin‚Ä¶
@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe It's in the house again this morning. It turns out that sellotaping the windows and doors is futile. I'm guessing it's in your house, too? If so, I'm sorry üòî

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe Hit the nail on the head üëç It's much more than a nuisance odour. It's causing serious stress, sleep deprivation, issues with breathing, migraine, sickness, and so on. I've read some scientific articles and the long-term effects of regular exposure to landfill gasses is scary üòî
